Module org.example
Package org.example

Class Management

java.lang.Object
org.example.Management
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class Management extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
The Management class handles the management functionality of the application.

  • Constructor Details

    • Management

      public Management()

  • Method Details

    • getUserData

      public void getUserData() throws SQLException
      Retrieves and displays user data based on the selected item in the list view. This method updates the UI elements with the selected user's information. It also updates the user list and refreshes the list view.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If there is an error retrieving user data from the database.

    • hideText

      public void hideText()
      This method clears the textview when the search is done

    • pressButton

      public void pressButton() throws SQLException
      Event handler for button press action. This method updates the text of the button.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If there is an error updating the text.

    • updateTextButton

      public void updateTextButton() throws SQLException
      Updates the text of the button based on the current block status. If the user is blocked, the button text is updated to unblock the user and perform related actions. If the user is not blocked, the button text is updated to block the user and perform related actions.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If there is an error updating the button text or performing database operations.

    • searchUsers

      public void searchUsers()
      Searches for users based on the entered search text and filters the user list accordingly. The search is performed using the text entered in the search bar.

    • addUsers

      public void addUsers() throws SQLException
      Retrieves user data from the database and populates the users list. Each user is represented by an instance of AdminUsers and added to the users list.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If an SQL exception occurs while retrieving user data from the database.

    • sendMail

      public void sendMail()
      Sends an email to the selected user with the content provided in the text area. The email is sent using the MailSender utility class, which handles the email sending process. If the content is empty, an error message is displayed.

    • hideContentStatus

      public void hideContentStatus()
      Clears the content status label, hiding any previous error or informational message.

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL location, ResourceBundle resources)
      Initializes the controller after its root element has been completely processed.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      location - the location used to resolve relative paths for the root object, or null if the location is not known.
      resources - the resources used to localize the root object, or null if the root object was not localized.
